resources.string: How to use \'Do not disturb\ mode?
If you want to stop FIND-E from tracking and notifying you for a while, use \'Do not disturb\' mode.
Tap FIND-E\'s avatar \nto turn off tracking
Tap again to turn it back on
Once you turn \'Do not disturb\' mode off, \n FIND-E will automatically reconnect \nand start tracking again.
How to set-up a silent area?
You can automatically mute areas, like home or office.
Connect your smartphone to WI-FI
Turn on silent Wi-Fi area in settings
Now you won\'t receive notifications from FIND-E while your phone is connected to particular Wi-Fi\n Once you leave this area, FIND-E will automatically turn itself on.

Select \'Remote camera button\' in app settings
